mapper.insert: INSERT INTO phoneadd(VNO, UNO, CNO, COLOR, INSTALLMENT, VATPRICE) values(SEQ_PHONEADD.nextval, #{uno}, #{cno}, #{color} , #{installment}, #{vatPrice})
mapper.select: select a.UNO, a.VNO, a.CNO, b.phone_name , b.giga , a.COLOR, a.INSTALLMENT , a.VATPRICE , a.REGDATE from phoneadd a join phonepro b on a.cno = b.cno where a.uno = #{uno}
